name: Legend Of Maratha Warriors
description:
This Interactive Game 'LEGEND OF MARATHA WARRIORS' is dedicated to our beloved Warrior King ‘Chatrapati Shivaji Maharaj’ and their ‘Maratha Warriors’. Including (virtual) Chatrapati Shivaji Maharaj, Rajmata Jijabai, Baji Prabhu Deshpande, Tanaji Malusare, Kondaji Farzand, Baji Pasalkar, Murarbaji Deshpande, Yashwanti the monitor lizard (ghorpad) and more legends.

GAME EXPERIENCE
Immerse yourself in one of the fast paced horse riding casual action game, with stunning visuals, particle effects and sound that turn every action into a real blockbuster action movie. Defeat the enemies and get pass through the traps set on the way to secure the fort.

POWER-UPS
Use special sword powerup for long range attack and devi powerup to become invincible for few seconds.

GAME LEVELS
40+ beautifully designed levels to challenge your skills with small storyboards.

Become a soldier in most courageous and fearless Maratha army to protect the nation’s pride and sovereignty.
Fight for survival in unforgiving Maratha war chapters against the inexorable enemy.
Fill the shoes of a patriotic Maratha soldier and experience the bravery, brotherhood, and sacrifice of the warriors guarding the Maratha empire.
The best fort defense, light & heavy cavalry, war archery and ninja stealth game, ambient in a fantasy Indian battlefield.
L.O.M.W brings to life the thrill and action of fearless Maratha warriors.
